pkgmetadata.longdescription: Search and Retrieve Data from Eurostat Database // Eurostat is the statistical office of the European Union and provides high quality statistics for Europe. Large set of the data is disseminated through the Eurostat database (https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/data/database). The tools are using the REST API with the Statistical Data and Metadata eXchange (SDMX) Web Services (https://wikis.ec.europa. eu/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=44165555) to search and download data from the Eurostat database using the SDMX standard.
